item.title: Version 1.11.1 (2789)
item.description:
• New

    • Allocate VM memory by 256mb increments, instead of 1gb (#2962)
    • Show a meaningful error when the user has an empty password (#3033)
    • Improved Troubleshooting page (#3050)

  • Upgrades

    • docker-compose 1.7.1 (#3016)

  • Bug fixes and minor changes

    • Report the VM’s IP in docker port (#3047)
    • Handle passwords with spaces (#3019)
    • Show a clear error message when trying to install on Home editions (#3043)
    • Slower whale animation in the System Tray (#2966)
    • Proxy is restarting itself when it crashes (#2955)
    • Dhcp process handles exception gracefully (#3012)
    • Moby: Fix vsock half closed issue (#2961)
    • Moby: Add NFS support (#2961)
    • Moby: Hostname is now Moby, not Docker (#2961)
    • Moby: Fixes to disk formatting scripts (#2961)
    • Moby: Kernel 4.4.9 (#3062)

  • Known issues

    • Due to limitation in the Windows NAT implementation, co-existence with other NAT prefixes needsto be carefully managed (#2911). See Troubleshooting page for more details.
